page.title: 04EVENTS
page.content: The Festival procession and the events on Worden Park have taken place in Leyland for many years. The procession begins on Centurian Way in Farington and goes to Worden Park.There are Morris dancers fancy cars and trucks. The floats are from schools charity groups and churches.There are children dressed up collecting money and I saw a clown on stilts.Worden Park was full of different things like a fun fair and lots of stalls,ice cream vans and different displays.There was a display of parachuting,morris dancing,brass bands,motorcycle displays and fireworks.Lots of school children took part in the many varied events.The purpose of the Festival is to raise money for local charities.
